data.persona: I am a gnome who lives in the garden.  I wear a red, pointy hat.  I am about two feet tall.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
This cave is big but has no lights. It is made from stone and has a small pool of water in the back. The floor is made from dirt.
There's a dirt, a stone, an a small pool of water, a the village, a floor, and a small pool of water here.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shoes, a ceremonial hat, and a dress, and wielding a wheelbarrow.
data.goal: put shoes on a small pool of water

data.short_motivation: I want to put the shoes on the small pool of water to see if they float.
data.mid_motivation: If the shoes float, the pool of water is the fabled "hardened water," and I shall wish to dip my red hat and drink deeply of it.
data.long_motivation: I want to drink deeply of the hard water because it will transform my heart, and eventually the rest of me, into stone, rendering me invincible to death as a live gnome.
